title: Resources
text:
Below are some useful resources and reports from previous water quality studies on Lake Rotorua:

Lake Rotorua Science Review Summary (2023)
Lake Rotorua Nutrient Management - Plan Change 10
Long-term nutrient loads and water quality for Lake Rotorua: 1965 to 2017 (2019)
Trend and State of nutrients in Lake Rotorua Streams 2002 - 2022 (2023)
Trends and state of nutrients in Lake Rotorua streams 2013 (2013)

title: GANTT Chart
text:
Below is the GANTT chart outlining the key deliverables and timeline for the Rotorua Lake Modelling – PC10 project:





gantt
    title Rotorua Lake Modelling – PC10 Deliverables
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    section Catchment Pilot
    "SWAT-MODFLOW pilot (3 catchments)" :a1, 2026-03-01, 30d

    section Lake Model Upgrade
    GLM-AED model upgrade            :b1, 2026-03-01, 30d
    Scaling decision – catchment     :b2, 2026-01-01, 60d

    section Scenario Testing
    Initial climate scenarios        :c1, 2026-09-01, 30d
    Preliminary advice re Rotoiti    :c2, 2026-09-01, 45d
    Complete lake model delivery     :c3, 2027-02-01, 30d
